fi.tuni.tiko

Class RaccoonRoll

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • fi.tuni.tiko.RaccoonRoll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class RaccoonRoll
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Main game class. Creates variables used in several classes and starts main menu
    Author:
    Heikki Kangas

        Parameters:
